item.description:
The idea of this Meetup is for a place for Sports Fans of Chicago teams to plan sporting events to watch their favorite teams with like-minded FANS. We will also be planning some non-team specific sports related activities like bike riding, hiking, bowling etc.
This meetup is part of the FAN Alliance. The FAN Alliance is a series of related general activitities meetups. The FAN Alliance does not discriminate with the exception that you are expected to be an adult nor do we charge event or membership fees. The goal of this alliance is that it is a fun and safe environment for everyone. By joining you are implicitly agreeing to respect other members privacy. Both Singles and People in Committed Relationships are welcome!
Click here for a list of Alliance Meetups:
http://socialnetwork.meetup.com/442/pages/Alliance/
item.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England
